item.title: Just Often Enough To Forget ( JOETF )
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description: Finally came up with a term for notes that I write here about things that I do infrequently enough to forget between intervals, but often enough that I remember that I wrote about them here: Just Often Enough To Forget ( JOETF ). So I’ve created a new joetf tag for posts and may prefix […]
item.content:encoded:
Finally came up with a term for notes that I write here about things that I do infrequently enough to forget between intervals, but often enough that I remember that I wrote about them here: Just Often Enough To Forget ( JOETF ).

So I’ve created a new joetf tag for posts and may prefix the title for those types of posts with [JOETF]. Of course at some point I’ll probably forget what JOETF stands and need to search for this post to refresh my memory.
